name: Faruzan
desc:
"Enigmatic Machinist" Faruzan

Simple machines, mysterious world

customize.name: Faruzan
customize.desc:
"Enigmatic Machinist" Faruzan

Simple machines, mysterious world

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Let me see what makes this game so very 'ingenious'..."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Faruzan's deck has a theme of "inserting cards into her deck" and "drawing cards," generating cards that help her gain the advantage before drawing and playing them.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Faruzan
customize.desc:
"Enigmatic Machinist" Faruzan

Simple machines, mysterious world

customize.name: Yelan
customize.desc:
"Valley Orchid" Yelan

The world is vast and infinite, the solitary one comes and goes as she pleases.

customize.name: Sayu
customize.desc:
"Mujina Ninja" Sayu

By your side without a trace, like a character from a dream.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Faruzan
customize.desc:

customize.name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
customize.desc:
Faruzan: The Wondrous Path of Truth

"Truth repeats its course."

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
customize.desc:
Faruzan: The Wondrous Path of Truth

"Truth repeats its course."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"They say it's a young person's game... But it is quite interesting. Definitely worth further study."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Faruzan" starts with the Talent Card "The Wondrous Path of Truth" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Manifest Gale</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Manifest Gale</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached uses Charged Attack:</color> Spend 1 less <color=#ffffff>Unaligned Element</color> , <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , and attaches <color=#ffffff>Pressurized Collapse</color> to the target character.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Pressurized Collapse</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Switch the character to which this is attached to be the Active Character.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>
(Only 1 such effect can be on the same side of the playing field)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 3</color>
<color=#ffffff>When this Summon is on the field:</color> Opposing character(s) take +1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> .

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Charged Attack</color>
Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.
<color=#ece5d8>Unaligned Element</color>
You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

value.name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
value.desc:
Faruzan: The Wondrous Path of Truth

"Truth repeats its course."

value.text: Reward for inviting Faruzan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Faruzan
value.desc: A researcher from "one hundred years ago." She enjoys self-identifying as everyone's senior, and has significant knowledge of ancient scripts and machines of all kinds.
